122.content: Echoing off from the middle tunnel is the sound of water. You carefully walk towards the sound, but being in the tunnel, it's coming from every direction. After what seemed to be hours, you stumble into a chamber with an underground lake in the middle of the chamber. You bend over to see if the water is fresh enough to drink from, and hear giggling in front of you. Spooked, you look up and around to see nothing and no one. "I must be going insane...But why?" you quietly speak. "I don't think you're crazy..." you hear from behind you. "...in fact, you sort of look...delicious". info.brief_description: The Land of Fantasy, where your wildest dreams come true!

Given I'm not the best writer, I'll try my best..

You awaken on a land mass in an unknown location. Upon discovery, you find every dream (and every fetish) on this land mass. Do you live on, or succumb to your wildest dreams?
